text: Vietnam competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Vietnam entered seven swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Nguyen Paul Le |align=left|50 m backstroke |25.73 |32 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m butterfly |24.58 |46 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|Nguyễn Hữu Kim Sơn |align=left|400 m freestyle |3:55.59 |33 |colspan=2 |colspan=2|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Nguyễn Huy Hoàng |align=left|800 m freestyle |7:52.74 |15 |colspan=2 |colspan=2|Did not advance |- |align=left|1500 m freestyle |15:02.35 |14 |colspan=2 |colspan=2|Did not advance |- |align=left|Phạm Thanh Bảo |align=left|200 m breaststroke |2:14.90 |36 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|Trần Hưng Nguyễn |align=left|400 m individual medley |4:25.49 |25 |colspan=2 |colspan=2|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left|Lê Thị Mai Thảo |align=left|200 m butterfly |2:13.11 |22 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=3|Nguyễn Thị Ánh Viên |align=left|400 m freestyle |4:13.35 |19 |colspan=2 |colspan=2|Did not advance |- |align=left|200 m individual medley |2:17.79 |26 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|400 m individual medley |4:47.96 |19 |colspan=2 |colspan=2|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Vietnam at the World Aquatics Championships Category:2017 in Vietnamese sport
